usage.cn: 只要做你自己就好，你是最好的。
usage.eng: Just be yourself; you are wonderful.

usage.cn: 只要你在这，就无所畏惧
usage.eng: You are here ,there's nothing I fear.

usage.cn: 我恨现在你仅仅是我的回忆而已。
usage.eng: I hate that you're just a memory now.

usage.cn: 如果你恨我，那么你就是失败者，而不是我。-------艾薇儿
usage.eng: If you hate me,you're the loser，not me.
